name: canOpener
description: A basic can opener for opening cans of food. Nothing fancy, but it works.

verbInteractions.Use: It could open a tin can if you had one.
verbInteractions.Eat: It's metal. You'd break your teeth.
verbInteractions.Examine: A basic can opener for opening cans of food. Nothing fancy, but it works.
verbInteractions.Take: You take the can opener from where it sits.
verbInteractions.Drop: You put the can opener down.
